shot.composition: POV following a dark, deoxygenated red blood cell through the capillaries surrounding the lung alveoli, witnessing the precise moment of oxygenation. 16:9.
shot.lens: Extreme macro bio-lens with high dynamic range, capturing the color shift perfectly.
shot.camera_movement: Smooth, gliding movement through the intricate capillary network, panning to the alveolar interface.

subject.description: Red blood cells undergoing a sudden, dramatic transition from dark burgundy/purple to bright, vibrant cherry red as they absorb oxygen.
subject.props: Glowing oxygen molecules (bright white/blue particles) diffusing across the membrane from the alveoli and binding to the cells.

scene.environment: A delicate, intricate network of capillaries wrapped around airy alveolar sacs. The environment is bright, moist, and ethereal.

visual_details.action: The dramatic, instant color shift of the blood cells. The camera witnesses the revitalization of the blood.
visual_details.special_effects: Visible gas exchange effect (glowing particle diffusion), beautiful light diffusion, shimmering effect on the cell surface during oxygenation.
visual_details.negative_prompt_video: Muted colors, slow transition, dark, murky, blurry details, low resolution, black and white, grey tones, minimalism, fast action.

cinematography.lighting: Bright, soft, diffused lighting, creating a glowing, airy atmosphere. Ethereal and uplifting. Highlighting the color change.
cinematography.color_palette: Dark burgundy/purple transitioning to vibrant cherry red. Pale pinks, whites, and light blues (lung tissue).

audio.music: Ethereal, uplifting orchestral score with choir vocals and soft chimes (Vangelis style). Calming and expansive.
audio.ambient: Gentle sound of breathing (inhalation and exhalation) synchronized with the environment. Faint fluid movement.
audio.sound_effects: Subtle shimmering, sparkling sound synchronized with the oxygenation.
